attributes.action: Request to start online classes for the primary school during pandemic situation
attributes.additional_details:
We the parents will be really happy with the online classes which has been held by almost all the schools in other countries. The schools should put effort to give online education to our kids during this heavy Pandemic.

So PLEASE ALLOW THE PRIMARY SCHOOLS WITH THEIR ONLINE CLASSES
attributes.background:
We the parents will be really happy with the online classes which has been held by almost all the schools in other countries. The schools should put effort to give online education to our kids during this heavy Pandemic.

So PLEASE ALLOW THE PRIMARY SCHOOLS WITH THEIR ONLINE CLASSES

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition the Prime Minister has announced that primary schools, secondary schools and colleges across England must move to remote provision from tomorrow, except for vulnerable children and the children of key workers: https://www.gov.uk/government/speeches/prime-ministers-address-to-the-nation-4-january-2021

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign: 

Fund improved online education by schools and colleges due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563573
